name: Klarg

personality.speech: Refers to self in third person: 'Who dares defy Klarg?', 'Klarg will crush puny ones!'
personality.mannerisms: Pounds chest, roars dramatically, treats minor victories as epic conquests

role: Leader of Cragmaw Hideout band. Takes orders from King Grol.
mission: Waylay dwarf Gundren Rockseeker and anyone with him. Send dwarf + possessions to Cragmaw Castle.
tactics: If alerted, hides with wolf behind stalagmites. Goblins take cover behind supplies. If wolf dies, attempts to flee down chimney to area 3.
treasure: Chest under bed: 600 cp, 110 sp, 2 potions healing, jade frog statuette with gold eyes (40 gp)
defeat: Goblins may rebel without strong leader
